messages.subject: Re: Auroras
messages.msgSnippet: We noticed the surreal colors and lights in the sky last night and wondered if they were the Northern Lights. Then I heard on the news that that s what they
messages.messageBody:
We noticed the surreal colors and lights in the sky last night and
wondered if they were the Northern Lights. Then I heard on the news
that that's what they were. Tonight, we drove out into the county
where it is really dark (we live just slightly farther out than
subburb). I never dreamed we would be able to see them in Ohio!
Incredible is all I can say. Makes me want to go to Alaska even more!

in peace,

Chris O'Connor

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Auroras
messages.msgSnippet: We got to see them here in Northeastern Colorado. Shona and John Dunning mummranch@plains.net [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
We got to see them here in Northeastern Colorado.

Shona and John Dunning

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Auroras
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m in Montana, and since the end of October there have been frequent and fabulous northern lights.  The best I ve seen since moving from Alaska. Sorry you
messages.messageBody:
> Where do you live? I've never seen the northern lights here in
> Toronto!
> Leslie

I'm in Montana, and since the end of October there have been frequent and
fabulous northern lights. The best I've seen since moving from Alaska.
Sorry you missed them!
Deb L

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Auroras
messages.msgSnippet: I once saw the Aurora Borealis near Sopchoppy Florida!!!! about 30 miles south of Tallahassee, on the Gulf Coast!! It was small but so beautiful. Magenta to
messages.messageBody:
I once saw the Aurora Borealis near Sopchoppy
Florida!!!! about 30 miles south of Tallahassee, on
the Gulf Coast!! It was "small" but so beautiful.
Magenta to purple to orange to intense red. Saw them
once before in the Yukon. Undulating, ethereal...made
me feel as if I had been personally touched by the
Creator.

Sharon
